text: @realDonaldTrump Do you know who a real leader is? A real leader is the commander of the aircraft carrier Roosevelt..who'd rather lose his career then let his crew suffer due to the bumbling and mishandling of the #Covid19 crisis by #DonaldTrump aka #DonaldDeath #TrumpIsNoLeader
